1: <pb/><t>Man̈ eyic'chaan̈ e b'a yuj tas tze c'ulej q'uic'an eyalani, yujto man̈ eyojtacoc tas tzuji q'uic'an chi'.</t>
2: <t>Ch'ococab' eb' tzex alan vach'il, yujto man̈ vach'oc tato a ex tic tzeyaloch e b'a vach'ilal.</t>
3: <t>A q'uen yax q'ueen yed' q'uen arena te al q'ueen, pural sq'ue q'uen cuuj, icha pax chi' yaj yoval eb' chuc spensar, yelxo val max techajlaj cuuj.</t>
4: <t>A c'ac'alc'olal te chuc, nivan tas tz'ixtaxb'at yuuj, palta axo chichonc'olal, malaj mach syal stec'b'an sb'a d'a yichan̈.</t>
5: <t>A eb' tzon̈ xajanani, tzon̈ scach eb' d'a juntzan̈ chucal sco c'ulej.</t>
6: <t>A eb' vach' eyac'an yed'oc, say eb' tas vach' tz'och e vach'iloc vach'chom ya tzeyab'i. Axo eb' tz'och lac'naj d'ayex jun, tzeyil e b'a d'a eb', yujto a eb' chi', ajc'ool yajoch eb' d'ayex.</t>
7: <t>A eb' b'ud'anxo sc'ool, vach'chom a noc' yal chab' syuc' eb', palta chuclaj yuc'ji noc' syab' eb'. Axo pax eb' ay svejel jun, vach'chom c'a' junoc tasi, palta te chi' syab' eb'.</t>
8: <t>A eb' syactejcan yal yuninal, lajan eb' icha junoc noc' much syactejcan so' yed' yune'.</t>
9: <t>A yuj perfume yed' tas scaq'uec' d'a co jolom, yuj chi' stzalajb'i co c'ool, icha chi' tz'aj co tzalaj yuj razón syac' eb' camigo d'ayon̈ yuj on̈ xajanan eb'.</t>
10: <t>Malaj b'aq'uin̈ tze chaquel eb' eyamigo yed' pax eb' yamigo eb' e mam. Man̈ ex b'at eyal e cusc'olal d'a junoc e c'ab' eyoc. Te vach' tato tzeyal e cusc'olal chi' d'a eb' eyamigo cajan d'a e lac'anil, d'a yichan̈ eb' e c'ab' eyoc cajan d'a najat.</t>
11: <t>Ex vuninal, jelan tzeyutej e b'a, yic vach' tzeyac' tzalajb'oc in c'ool, yic vach' ay tas syal in pactzitan d'a eb' tzin paticaneli.</t>
12: <t>A eb' ay spensar, syil eb' tastac ay smay, scolan sb'a eb' d'ay, axo pax eb' malaj spensar jun, sb'eyn̈ejb'at eb' masanto sjavi yaelal d'a yib'an̈ eb'.</t>
13: <t>A eb' syac'och sb'a fiadoral d'a eb' anima man̈ yojtacoc, yac'ocab'can junoc mojan̈ spichul eb' yuj q'uen tumin chi'.</t>
14: <t>Tato ayic vanto sacb'i, tzon̈ avaj d'a eb' camigo yic sco c'anb'an sc'ol eb', a tz'aj yab'an eb', ichato chuc van calan d'a eb'.</t>
15: <t>A eb' ix ix ovaln̈ej yaji, lajan eb' ix icha junoc tz'uj sd'ujd'ujan d'a stiempoal n̈ab'il q'uinal.</t>
16: <t>Tato sco nib'ej tz'och vaan eb' ix d'a yoval sc'ool chi', lajan icha to sco nib'ej sco yamoch vaan ic', icha pax to sco nib'ej sco yam aceite d'a yol co c'ab'.</t>
17: <t>A q'uen q'ueen, sn̈icchajq'ue ye q'ueen yed' junocxo yetq'uenal, icha pax chi' eb' anima syic' sjelanil eb' yuj slolon yed' junocxo yetanimail.</t>
18: <t>A eb' stan̈van te' higo avab'il yuuj, slo sat te' eb', icha pax chi' eb' ayoch spensar d'a spatrón, tz'ic'jichaan̈ eb' yuj eb' spatrón chi'.</t>
19: <t>Icha val scutej quilanem co sat d'a yol a a', icha pax chi' scutej quilani tas yaj co b'eyb'al ayic squilanoch co pensar.</t>
20: <t>A chamel yed' b'aj smucchaj eb' chamnac, malaj b'aq'uin̈ sb'ud'ji, icha chi' eb' anima, malaj b'aq'uin̈ stzactzaj eb' snib'anoch tastac.</t>
21: <t>A q'uen oro yed' q'uen plata, tz'ac'chaj proval q'uen d'a scal c'ac', icha pax chi' eb' anima, tz'ac'chaj proval eb' yuj tas b'aj syal vach' lolonel.</t>
22: <t>Vach'chom sco ten chojoc eb' malaj spensar d'a yib'an̈ junoc tenlab', palta max el-laj sman̈ pensaril eb' chi' d'ay.</t>
23: <t>Ayexn̈ejocab' och ijan eyilan noc' e calnel, scham val eyilanpax tas tzeyutej e tan̈van noc',</t>
24: <t>yujto a e b'eyumal yed' eyopisio man̈ masaniloc tiempo ayec' eyed'oc.</t>
25: <t>Ayic sjochchaj q'ue vaan an̈ an̈c'ultac yed' an̈ ac d'a jolomtac vitz, smolchaj q'ue vaan an̈, svolanxi an̈ junelxo.</t>
26: <t>A xil noc' e calnel tz'och e pichuloc, ay pax e tumin yuj noc' e chiva yic syal e manan e luum,</t>
27: <t>a pax noc' e chiva chi', man̈ jantacoc lech syac' noc' yic tzeyuq'uej yed' eb' ix eyetb'eyum, eb' eyuninal yed' pax eb' smunlaj d'ayex.</t>
